The style was really cute but the pants material was cheap and pilled up after just 2 washes. The headband was also very tight and made a mark on baby's head even after just wearing for a few minutes.
True to size love so cute!!
Absolutely adorable. Fit my infant well ( ~ 22in tall and ~9lbs. Stretchy. Head band was secure but not tight. One of my favorite outfits. Bell bottom/flares are very cute.

The pants and bow were perfect for our 2 month old's first Christmas. The bow is a bit tight though. I didn't leave it on her head for long since it would leave a red mark. She's in the 50th percentile for head size, for reference. And she's long and skinny, so the onesie doesn't quite fit yet. But it'll be cute when she is big enough for it.

I purchased the 0-3 month size and my child is 3.5 months when wearing this outfit. It’s a super cute outfit but the size of the hair bow is way too big and so is the neckline (see picture of neckline). The pants are great! I probably wouldn’t buy again.

I couldn’t be happier with the Christmas outfit I ordered! The quality exceeded my expectations—it’s well-made and fit true to size & didn’t shrink too much in the dryer. My daughter received so many compliments wearing it, and it held up well through multiple wears and washes. If you’re looking for a cute and affordable holiday outfit, this one is a winner. I’d definitely order again!

My daughter looked absolutely precious in her Fourth of July outfit, and she received so many compliments from friends and family. It's the perfect outfit for capturing those special holiday memories. I highly recommend this Fourth of July outfit for any little girl who wants to celebrate in style. I sized up on this one for my daughter because I wanted her to be able to wear it in the fall. It isn't too massive on her and just the little bit she'll grow in the next month will be perfect to fill the outfit out!  The bottoms have the feel of the infamous buttery soft leggings people talk about, and I think they'll be such a comfortable pair for her to wear!  This washes nicely with no issues and we washed it on a normal load with other baby clothes.
